Hi,
I just upgraded to ant 1.6.2
 
junit is 3.7
 
I have taken ant-junit.jar out and kept it i a separate directory..
I have this and junit.jar together..
I then use taskdef to define junit and junitreport
 
<property name="my_ant" location="${env.ANT_HOME}/lib"/>
    <path id="junit.path">
        <pathelement location="${lib-ext-java.dir}/ant-junit.jar"/>
        <pathelement location="${lib-ext-java.dir}/junit.jar"/>
    </path>
 <taskdef  name="junitreport"  classpathref="junit.path"
classname="org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLResultAggrega
tor"/>
 <taskdef  name="junit"  classpathref="junit.path"
classname="org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTask"/>
 
 
my tests run, but junitreport seems to fail:
 
test and report:
     [echo]
     [echo] C:\home\sadaf\work\Engineering\Libraries2\external\java
    [junit] Running UsesNewJar
    [junit] Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Time elapsed: 0.328
sec
    [junit] Test UsesNewJar FAILED

BUILD FAILED
C:\...\build.xml:244: The following error occurred while exec
uting this line:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/optional/junit/XalanExecutor
 
 

Can anyone tell me what I am missing?
 
Sadaf
